Voice-support

What is Wati?
Wati is a chatbot platform that enables businesses to create AI-powered chatbots for WhatsApp.
Key features of Wati include WhatsApp automation, chatbot builder, customizable templates, multilingual support, and integration with CRM systems.
Alternatives to Wati include BotPenguin, Chatfuel, ManyChat, and MobileMonkey, which offer similar chatbot building and automation capabilities across various messaging platforms.
Pros: WhatsApp automation, a user-friendly chatbot builder, customizable templates, multilingual support, and CRM integration.
Cons: limitations in platform support, pricing considerations, and a learning curve for users without chatbot experience.
BotPenguin runs circles around Wati when it comes to price, integrations and channels. There's simply no comparison
Try BotPenguin
What is Intercom?
Intercom is a customer messaging platform that facilitates communication with customers across multiple channels. It offers live chat, email marketing, customer segmentation, and in-app messaging to enhance customer interactions.
Alternatives to Intercom include BotPenguin, an omnichannel customer engagement solution with live chat and enterprise integrations. Freshchat, Help Scout, and Userlike.
Intercom is expensive and relies heavily on integrations and information handling, which is not recommended due to privacy concerns.
Pros: Comprehensive customer messaging, advanced features, scalability, integration capabilities, analytics, and insights.
Cons: Complexity for beginners, pricing, learning curve, customer support limitations.
Stop being carried into dogma, Think differently, and choose better. Choose BotPenguin
Try BotPenguin

Frequently Asked Questions
Do Wati and Intercom offer real-time analytics?
Intercom offers real-time analytics, providing insights about user interactions, while such feature doesn’t come natively with Wati.
Is it easy to set up bots in Wati compared to Intercom?
Intercom facilitates a more user-friendly bot setup, while setting up bots in Wati might require some technical know-how.
How is the customer support of Intercom compared to Wati?
Intercom offers extensive customer support via multiple channels round the clock, whereas support from Wati is fairly basic.
Do Intercom and Wati cater to different business sizes?
Intercom caters to small, medium, and large businesses, while Wati is more suitable for SMEs.
Are the platforms GDPR compliant?
Both Intercom and Wati comply with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) to ensure data security.
